name: CONFLUENCE_BASE_URL
description: The base URL for your Confluence instance API (e.g., `https://your-domain.atlassian.net/wiki`).

name: CONFLUENCE_TOKEN
description: A Confluence Personal Access Token (PAT) for API authentication.

name: CONFLUENCE_INSECURE_SKIP_VERIFY
description: Set to 'true' to disable TLS certificate validation. Use with caution, as this is a security risk. Recommended only for self-hosted Confluence instances with self-signed certificates.
